name: Rwen's Day Out
description:
This is a short visual novel about a dragon hanging out with her friends. There are a few story branches and endings. This is my first visual novel and renpy game, so critiques are most welcome.

Illustrated and written by ladyofmae.

Sound and music from SoundBible and Opensound

If you like my work you can donate to my  kofi page

https://www.ko-fi.com/Z8Z26UMB
